# Remote Indexes for Minecraft 1.21.11 Fabric Mod Development

This page serves as a remote index for Minecraft 1.21.11 Fabric mod development, providing links to various resources, documentation, and guides that are relevant to mod developers working with this specific version of Minecraft and the Fabric modding framework.

## JavaDocs

[Fabric Loader API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-loader-0.18.4/)
[Fabric API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/fabric-api-0.141.3+1.21.11/)
[Fabric Yarn API](https://maven.fabricmc.net/docs/yarn-1.21.11+build.4/)

## Developer Guides

[Developer Guides](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/)
[Creating a Project](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/creating-a-project)
[Project Structure](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/project-structure)
[Setting Up VS Code](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/vscode/setting-up)
[Opening a Project in VS Code](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/vscode/opening-a-project)
[Launching the Game in VS Code](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/vscode/launching-the-game)
[Generating Sources in VS Code](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/vscode/generating-sources)
[Tips and Tricks for VS Code](https://docs.fabricmc.net/develop/getting-started/vscode/tips-and-tricks)
